alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Benton, northwestern Carroll and central Washington Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 945 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Pea Ridge to 4 miles east of Adair State Park. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Greenland... Garfield... Gateway... War Eagle... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Elm Springs... Goshen... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 46 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
